tips.title: Allergen Introduction Tips
tips.tip1: Introduce one new allergen at a time, waiting 2-3 days before the next
tips.tip2: Offer new allergens in the morning so you can monitor for reactions
tips.tip3: Start with small amounts and gradually increase if tolerated
tips.tip4: Once introduced, continue offering the allergen regularly (2-3 times/week)
tips.tip5: Contact your pediatrician if you notice hives, swelling, vomiting, or difficulty breathing
